MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-FEB-2021 23:59.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:58pm. Our emergency response team have inspected the Winterfield Gardens substation and have now established an underground cable fault. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:05pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021.
